references.reason: This paper provides a detailed technical report on GPT-4, a powerful large language model that is central to the current research on full-duplex dialogue systems.
This paper introduced the concept of few-shot learning in large language models, which is fundamental to the development of more efficient and adaptable conversational AI agents.

references.paper_title: Llama 2: Open foundation and fine-tuned chat models
references.reason: This paper introduces Llama 2, a large language model that serves as the basis for the full-duplex dialogue system presented in the paper, demonstrating significant advancements in conversational AI.

references.paper_title: Gpts are gpts: An early look at the labor market impact potential of large language models
references.reason: This paper examines the potential impact of large language models on the labor market, providing valuable context for understanding the implications of advancements in AI conversational agents.

references.paper_title: Conformer: Convolution-augmented transformer for speech recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the Conformer model, a crucial component for speech recognition, significantly influencing the performance and efficiency of the full-duplex dialogue system.
